name: Hover Run (Finnn)
description:
Use your hoverboard to fly across the city and reach the goal while avoiding acid and bombs!

A fairly difficult 2D platformer with 6 levels.

Controls

Move - A / D or Arrow keys

Jump - Space or W

Hoverboard - Shift

Drop - S

Made in a week for the Insane Game Jam: Future

If the web build is lagging, try the downloadable versions below
